TopicTitle: My plane keeps flipping over and i'm clueless

Articles.Content:
This my flying coffin rn, i'm starting so i got not a lot of parts

To the best of my knowledge the plane is supposed to fly, but I don't know why it doesn't fly.

Your control surfaces are close to the center of balance and so have little leverage. Try moving them farther back. This will likely require adding a bit of additional lift to the front as well. 

And welcome to the forum.
